appendix.title: Specification Change Tracking
appendix.para: This is to facilitate human tracking of changes between XLIFF Versions &version; and &pversion;.

listitem.para: Produced two versions of the specification:

simplelist.member: Core: simplified version that does not include optional modules.
Extended: complete version, including all modules.

listitem.para: Changed namespace for the core module to urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:2.2.
Added an optional ref attribute to <note> element.
Changed the type of version attribute to an enumeration containing 2.0, 2.1 and 2.2 as valid values.
Allowed an optional <notes> element at the start of <xliff>.
Allowed an optional <mda:metadata> element at the start of <xliff>.
Removed references to Schematron, NVDL and Test Suite from this specification.
Removed the informative Change Tracking Extension.
Renamed Appendix B to "XLIFF Grammar Files (Normative)".
Added new Plural, Gender, and Select Module.
Updated Appendix A with the official MIME type listed in IANA Media Type Registry.

appendix.para: In spite of the above mentioned changes, fixes, clarifications, and additions, the practical workings of the previous versions of the XLIFF Core have not been affected. All valid XLIFF 2.0 and 2.1 files are valid XLIFF 2.2 files. The changes introduced in version 2.2 are designed to preserve compatibility with versions 2.0 and 2.1.
NVDL and Schematron files used in previous versions of XLIFF are available at https://github.com/oasis-tcs/xliff-xliff-22/tree/master/xliff-21.
